main event: A civilian reported seeing a disc-shaped object with a reddish glow near Denver, Colorado on May 6, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 45 seconds,The object was the size of a hockey puck,The object moved in a straight path and disappeared behind a mountain,The weather was clear at the time of the sighting,The object might have been a meteor.
sighted object: one disc-shaped object with a reddish glow
